default.title: Frosted Stein
default.description: Share a smile every time you raise your glass with this handsome 16-ounce frosted stein. Perfect as a single gift or in a set. Made of high-quality frosted glass. Dishwasher-safe with mild detergents. Image is full-wrap and we recommend a landscape oriented photo.

en_US.title: Frosted Stein
en_US.description: Share a smile every time you raise your glass with this handsome 16-ounce frosted stein. Perfect as a single gift or in a set. Made of high-quality frosted glass. Dishwasher-safe with mild detergents. Image is full-wrap and we recommend a landscape oriented photo.
